original_text:
Woe is me! For I have become
    as when the summer fruit has been gathered,
    as when the grapes have been gleaned:
there is no cluster to eat,
    no first-ripe fig that my soul desires.
korean_text: 재앙이로다 나여 나는 여름 과일을 딴 후와 포도를 거둔 후 같아서 먹을 포도송이가 없으며 내 마음에 사모하는 처음 익은 무화과가 없도다

sentences.original_text: as when the summer fruit has been gathered
as when the grapes have been gleaned
there is no cluster to eat
no first-ripe fig that my soul desires
sentences.korean_translation: 내 영혼이 갈망하는 첫 익은 무화과도 없구나
